snippet: Christian Lacroix collectibles are being showcased this weekend at the Manhattan Vintage Clothing Show, including a kaleidoscopic bodysuit awash in giant cheetah spots.
abstract: Christian Lacroix collectibles are being showcased this weekend at the Manhattan Vintage Clothing Show, including a kaleidoscopic bodysuit awash in giant cheetah spots.
lead_paragraph: A STIFFENED balloon skirt worthy of Marie Antoinette; a kaleidoscopic bodysuit awash in giant cheetah spots; shoulder-duster earrings of Murano glass: they are, in the deathless phrasing of Edina Monsoon, Lacroix, sweetie.
